item.title: Web Services with Node.js
item.description: What is node.js? According to the Node.js website: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome’s V8 JavaScript engine. Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model that makes it lightweight and efficient. Node.js' package ecosystem, npm, is the largest ecosystem of open source libraries in the world. Event-driven, non-blocking I/O model Node.js program execution consists of a single-threaded event loop. But all I/O methods in the Node.
